1: <pb/>Re' reey David, re' taqe i k'amal kib'eeh i aj Israel, xkisik' wach taqe i rak'uun i Asaf, taqe i rak'uun i Hemán, taqe rak'uun i Jehutun, taqe i kiq'orik rib'iral chib'ih ink'uhtjik cho chikiwach ruum i Dios. Eh noq xkiq'or rib'iral k'ahchi' kiq'ojem i kiarpa, i kikok' k'ahaam wach q'ooj, eh kipulato q'ooj.
2: <pb/>Eh re' Asaf, je' wili kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Zacuur, José, Netanías, Asarela. Re' ink'amwik kib'eeh re' Asaf, re' inq'orwik rib'iral i chib'ih ink'uhtjik chikiwach ruum i Dios, je' rukab' intaq'ab'jik wii' ruum i reey David.
3: <pb/>Re' Jedutún, je' wili i kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Gedalías, Zeri, Jesaías, Hasabías, Matatías, Simei, waqiib' chi kiib', re' Jedutún ink'amwik kib'eeh. Eh noq xkiq'or rib'iral ink'uhtjik chikiwach ruum i Dios i k'ahchi' kiq'ojem i kiarpa chi loq'oomb'al reh i Dios.
4: <pb/>Re' i Hemán, je' wili i kib'ihnaal i rak'uun: Buquías, Matanías, Uziel, Sebuel, Jeremot, Hananías, Hananías, Hanani, Eliata, Gidalti, Romanti-ezer, Josbecasa, Maloti, Hotir, Mahaziot.
5: Chu'nchel i re' rak'uun i Hemán, re' i xi kamanik chuwach i reey David chi jalal ruq'oral i Dios. Re' Hemán kajlaj i rak'uun ixib' rixq'uun xye'arik reh ruum i QaJaaw Dios ye'b'al ruloq'il.
6: Eh chu'nchel i re', re' Asaf, re' Jedutún, re' Hemán i kajaaw xk'amwik kib'eeh chi rulooq'jiik i QaJaaw Dios parupaat, ruuk' pulato q'ooj, ruuk' i kok' arpa, ruuk' i kok' k'ahaam wach q'ooj, xkian wo' hoq i xq'orarik keh ruum i reey David.
7: Eh kiib' siento ruuk' waxiqiib' ro'k'ahl chi kiib' chu'nchel i xi okik haa' chi tz'uuy, eh chi q'ojinik, chi loq'oomb'al reh i Dios. Tijimaj taqe chi korik, eh kik'uliil kiib'.
8: <pb/>Eh koxkisik' chi riij i lb'al reh nik' naa kokiik chi kamanik i ju'jun chi je' taqe mama' winaq, chi je' taqe kok'ijool, chi je' taqe k'amal b'eeh chi kamanik, chi je' taqe kore' k'ahchi' kitijem kiib'.
9: <pb/>Noq kisik' chi riij, re' peet xkahnik chinaah chi xokik chi kamanik: Re' i José, i rak'uun i Asaf, Re' rukab', re' i Gedalías ruch'ihil taqe rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk' kab'laj chi kiib'.
10: Re' i roox, re' Zacuur, ruch'ihil taqe rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk', kab'laj chi kiib'.
11: Re' rukaaj, re' Izri, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk', kab'laj chi kiib'.
12: Re' roo', re' Netanías, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk', kab'laj chi kiib'.
13: Re' ruwaaq, re' i Buquías, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk' kab'laj chi kiib'.
14: Re' ruwuuq, re' i Jesarela, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk', kab'laj chi kiib'.
15: Re' ruwahxaaq, re' i Jesahías, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk', kab'laj chi kiib'.
16: Re' rub'eleej, re' i Matanías ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk', kab'laj chi kiib'.
17: Re' rub'eleej, re' i Simei, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk', kab'laj chi kiib'.
18: Re' rujunlaaj re' i Azareel, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk' kab'laj chi kiib'.
19: Re' rukab'laaj re' i Hasabías, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk' kab'laj chi kiib'.
20: Re' roxlaaj re' i Subael, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk' kab'laj chi kiib'.
21: Re' xkajlaaj re' i Matatías, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk' kab'laj chi kiib' chu'nchel.
22: Re' ruho'lajuuj, re' i Jeremot, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk', kab'laj chi kiib'.
23: Re' ruwaqlaaj, re' i Hananías, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe ma' tokoom ta ruuk' kab'laj chi kiib'.
24: Re' ruwuqlaaj, re' i Josbecasa, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk', kab'laj chi kiib' chu'nchel.
25: Re' ruwaxaqlaaj, re' i Hananías, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk' kab'laj chi kiib'.
26: Re' rub'elejlaj, re' i Maloti, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk' kab'laj chi kiib'.
27: Re' rujuninaq, re' i Eliata, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk', kab'laj chi kiib'.
28: Re' rujinaj ru ka'winaq, re' i Hotir, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk' kab'laj chi kiib'.
29: Re' i rukab' ru ka'winaq, re' i Gidalti, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk' kab'laj chi kiib'.
30: Re' roox ru ka'winaq, re' i Mahaziot, ruch'ihil taqe i rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk', kab'laj chi kiib'.
31: Re' i rukaj ru ka'winaq, re' i Romanti-ezer, ruch'ihil taqe rak'uun, ruch'ihil taqe i ma' tokoom ta ruuk', kab'laj chi kiib'.
